name: react-agent (eylonmiz)
description: [项目级] The open-source React.js Autonomous LLM Agent。来源: https://github.com/eylonmiz/react-agent

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content: ReactAgent is an experimental autonomous agent that uses GPT-4 language model to generate and compose React components from user stories. It is built with React, TailwindCSS, Typescript, Radix UI, Shandcn UI, and OpenAI API.

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
LICENSE
README.md
SECURITY.md
SUMMARY.md
arch.md
architecture
architecture/Design Document Outline.md
architecture/Design Document Overview.md
architecture/High Level Developer Responsibilities.md
architecture/developer-responsibilities
architecture/guidelines-and-principles
architecture/in-scope-parts
backend
backend/main
code_of_conduct.md
contributing.md
frontend
frontend/main
frontend/shadcn-ui

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Generate React Components from user stories
- Compose React Components from existing components
- Use a local design system to generate React Components
- Use React, TailwindCSS, Typescript, Radix UI, Shadcn UI
- Built with Atomic Design Principles
